mean_cn: n.表演，演出；表现；执行；性能
mean_en: the act of performing a play, concert or some other form of entertainment; the way a person performs in a play, concert, etc.
sentence: Their music was great. I really loved the performance.
sentence_trans: 他们的音乐听起来很棒，我很爱这场演出。
word_etyma: perform表演 + ance表名词 → performance表演
